original_text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily, eateth and drinketh damnation to himself, not discerning the Lord's body.
korean_text: 주의 몸을 분별하지 못하고 먹고 마시는 자는 자기의 죄를 먹고 마시는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily
eateth and drinketh damnation to himself
